janadhipathithumata sinaha pahala wiya.angalum kamhalakata ha pera pasalakata giya janadhipathithuma kuda daruwan surathal karamin sita owun samanga chayarupayakata da peni sitimatada amathaka nokale ya.janadhipathi mandirayata pamina diwa aaharaya gath janadhipathithuma sawasa 3.30 ta pamana kurunagala bala pitathwa giye maligapitiye pawathwena shri lanka nidahas paksha 62 wani maha sanwathsarayata ha sandhana jaya thahawuru kerena mangala raliyata sahabhagi wima sandahayi.janadhipathithumage rathayema lohan rathwaththe mahathada nanwa gath athara sajin was mahatha ha gamini senarath mahathwaru pitupasa rathayaka gaman gathha.‚Äúlohan ada mara wadene mata une?‚Äù
